name: Colorbound (ladybug_games)
description:
In a colorless world ruled by  creatures that suck the life out of everything they touch, two kids with enchanted paintbrushes might be the only hope there is in defeating them! Join Mint, Beri, and Tiger Kitty as they go on a journey to restore color to the land!

Gameplay

  • Beat color-based puzzle maps solo, or pass-and-play with another person 
  • Defeat Leeches to earn points that unlock ~secrets~

Features

  • Cute and heartwarming story
  • Spooky yet silly enemies
  • Bright and colorful original art 
  • Upbeat chiptune music
